name: Hospital Management Software
short_description:
WinMedi 5.0 is an Integrated Hospital Management System developed by Winline India
It covers a wide range of hospital administration and management processes, and provides relevant information across the hospital to support effective decision making and future business planning in Indian Hospitals. The Hospital Management System incorporates advanced diagnostics practices and delivers key tangible benefits to clients across India. An inside-out understanding of how Multi-Speciality and Medical College Hospitals, Healthcare Groups and Institutions work has allowed us to refine and improvise our Software, catering to the varying requirements of our clients.
summary: WinMedi 5.0 is an Integrated Hospital Management System Software.
